title: How often should we hear from our literary agent? - Quora

response.answer_text: Usually, only when there’s business to discuss. But if you want to establish a regular check-in with your agent, I’m sure they’d be willing to schedule it. I talk to my agent regularly but that’s because I have a lot of business going on all the time. When I first started, I spoke (or emailed with) my agent maybe 2 or 3 times a year.

First and foremost, forget “shoulds.” This is something that you would need to discuss with your agent. Work it out. And there is no good reason to put the full burden on the agent; if you have a question or need to discuss something, YOU can start the conversation.
